Vocabulary Definition

Definition

VPN

Think of vpn as a protection field, it hides your location and gives hackers wrong information preventing them from hacking your data.

Anti-Virus

Think of Anti-virus as in a protection shield. It protects you from attacks from the enemy.

Data

Think of it as informations but on your computer. Your data is your personal information.

Good things to Know

IP. Address

Think of Ip address as in where you lived, there's two type of Ip address, IPV4 or IPV6. The main difference you need to know is that IPV4 is the general location of your computer while your IPV6 is your exact location.

Firewall

Firewall is a build Anti-Virus that offers protection against hacking softwares

Malware

Malwares are virus that tries to evade your computer and steal your data.

Phising

Phising is a term use to describe people when they trick people and scam people on the internet.
